messages.content: Write a 3 verse haiku about software supply chain attacks

Planting GMOs in software 
Seeds of doubt, promises to pluck them out
Emptying accounts, who will reap the harvest?
Write a 5 verse haiku about software supply chain attacks and Sonatype stopping them

IoTMonitor capturing the war
Vendor lock-in, all the tools you need
Emptying accounts, who will reap the harvest?
what is the structure of a haiku ?
